# **Code and plot**

```{r}
x <- 1:20               
n <- length(x)
a <- 0.2                
b <- 0.3                
sigma <- 0.5          
set.seed(22052023)
y <- a + b*x + sigma*rnorm(n)
#
fake <- data.frame(x,y)
plot(fake$x, fake$y, main = "Dados Observados e Reta de Regressao",pch=19)

```
